name: CAO - Vision - Epiphany
additionalNotes: Originally produced in 2007, CAO Vision stunned the industry with its gorgeous white boxes that featured stunning blue lighting. Fast forward to 2020, and while the boxes are still as amazing as ever, the cigar blend itself underwent a small, yet very pleasing overhaul. This one size, 7"x50 Churchill, is comprised now of an Ecuadorian Sumatra binder and Nicaraguan filler. These two delicious tobaccos were hand-picked by CAO blender and brand ambassador Rick Rodriguez to complement the stunning Cameroon wrapper's natural sweetness. Clocking in at a medium to full-bodied experience, this cigar will ignite your palate with notes of leather, espresso, and spice.
